title: Kylie Jenner sends temperatures soaring as she flaunts her curves in a seriously tight black dress
text:
She's never shied away from flaunting her fabulous body.

And Kylie Jenner was at it again as she put her killer curves on display while enjoying a laid-back day at her place.

The reality star, 22, wore a seriously skin tight black dress in a series of snaps posted to her Instagram on Monday.

Dangerous curves ahead! Kylie Jenner was at it again as she put her killer curves on display while enjoying a laid-back day at her place

'real chill like a sunday,' Kylie captioned the snaps.

Indeed, the star looked quite relaxed as she effortlessly showed off her fantastic physique outside.

She wore her glossy black hair down in loose, flowing waves that cascaded alongside her waist.

Kylie tousled her jet black locks while gazing at her reflection towards the patio doors.

Work it! Jenner left little to the imagination in the skin tight number

Strike a pose: The trendy dress clung to Jenner's backside

The beauty mogul was the picture of radiance with a touch of pink blush, mauve lip stick, and a winged slick of eye liner.

For those wondering how exactly Kylie achieved her incredibly polished look, she posted a mini tutorial on her Instagram stories.

The reality star recorded herself as she did her own makeup using products from her collection, Kylie Cosmetics.

Check it out: Jenner did her makeup earlier that day using her own makeup collection, Kylie Cosmetics

Kylie launched the line back in 2015 with just lip products, but since then has expanded it to include blush, eye shadow, concealer, and now skin care.

Kylie believes her sincere passion for her line has helped make it a huge hit with fans.

Speaking with Kim Kardashian for ES Magazine last year, she said: 'It's the most authentic thing I've done in my career, and it really relates to me, and I feel like people can tell that I'm super passionate about it.

'It came from an insecurity and I turned it into something. I was insecure about my lips, and lipstick is what helped me feel confident.

'And I feel like people could see that it's authentic to me, and it was organic, and it just worked!'
description: The reality star, 22, wore a seriously skin tight black dress in a series of snaps posted to her Instagram on Monday. 'real chill like a sunday,' the beauty businesswoman captioned the snaps.
